titles.title: How Can I Help but Love Him

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Down from His splendor in glory He came Into a world of woe, Took on Himself all my guilt and my shameâ€“ Why should He love me so?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: How can I help but love Him When He loved me so? How can I help but love Him When He loved me so?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I am unworthy to take of His grace, Wonderful grace so free; Yet Jesus suffered and died in my place, E'en for a soul like me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He is the fairest of thousands to me, His love is sweet and true; Wonderful beauty in Him I now see, More than I ever knew.
